DEFAULT.climb_via: .msg {callsign} FLIGHT {callsign}/{date} {dep} {arr} PDC {callsign} XPNDR {beacon} {dep} {type} P{p_time} {cruise} {dep} {route} {arr} {remarks} EDCT CLEARED {sid} DEPARTURE {tran} TRSN CLIMB VIA SID EXP {cruise} 10 MIN AFT DP,DPFRQ {dep_freq} END OF MESSAGE
